item.title: My humble home-lab
item.description: Intro Hello! I’ve not really figured out how to write in the style of a blog yet, so this probably comes across as somewhere between a Twitter thread and formal presentation. I’ve been tinkering with secondary computers since I got a Pi 3B for my birthday in 2016, but didn’t really use it for what I imagined a server to be, outside of installing Pi-hole to do DNS-level ad blocking. I wasn’t that interested in the GPIO capabilities outside of a university project, and wanted something more powerful to play with.
